name: Commodore 64: a visual Commpendium by Bitmap Books
blurb: A book that celebrates the beauty of the greatest home \ncomputer ever made; the C64.

rewards.reward: A BIG THANK YOU: A massive thank you from me! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

PDF: You will get a PDF version of the book. As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE BOOK: You get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE BOOK AND FULL SET OF 'LOADER' POSTCARDS: You get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory and all 5 'loading screen' postcards. As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE PSYTRONIK PLEDGE: You get a disk copy of 15th Anniversary Edition of Mayhem In Monsterland, 20 Years of Psytronik music double CD and 3 A3 posters (Vice Squad, Soulless and Darkness). ALL items are signed by the man himself; Jason \u2018Kenz\u2019 Mackenzie! You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE SIGNED DIZZY POSTER PLEDGE: You get an A2 Dizzy map poster signed by the Oliver Twins. These are actual maps used in Commodore Format, created by Andy Roberts. You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE SIGNED ROGER FRAMES PRINT PLEDGE: You get an A4 print of an iconic Roger Frames illustration used in Commodore Format magazine. See the main description on the left for an image of the actual illustration. The print will then be signed by illustrator Mike Roberts. You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

2 BOOKS AND 2 FULL SETS OF 'LOADER' POSTCARDS: You get 2 books in all their full colour lithographic glory and 2 sets of all 5 'Loader' postcards. As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE BOOK AND LIMITED EDITION MICRO HEXAGON C64 CART: You get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory and also a limited edition boxed cartridge of Micro Hexagon by Paul Koller. Box also includes vinyl sticker, booklet and folded A3 poster. Only 100 will ever be made of this amazing game. As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes. Game will be posted in May after the campaign finishes. Worldwide postage of game is free.

THE BOOK AND LIMITED EDITION SIGNED MICRO HEXAGON C64 CART: You get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory and also a limited edition boxed cartridge of Micro Hexagon by Paul Koller. Box also includes vinyl sticker, booklet, A3 folded poster and rolled A2 poster. Only 100 will ever be made of this amazing game and each one is personally signed and numbered by Paul Koller and Mikkel Hastrup. As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes. Game will be posted in May after the campaign finishes. Worldwide postage of game is free.

THE OLIVER FREY PLEDGE: You will get a copy of 'The History of Ocean' book signed by Oliver Frey, Roger Kean and Chris Wilkins and also an A4 print of the Zzap Christmas Special artwork signed by Oliver Frey. You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE SIGNED ISSUE 1 OF COMMODORE FORMAT PLEDGE: You get a signed copy of Issue 1 of Commodore Format complete with cover tape, signed by editor; Steve Jarratt. You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE BOOK SIGNED BY STOO CAMBRIDGE: You get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory, personally signed by Sensible Software legend Stoo Cambridge! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE S.I.T. PLEDGE: Legendary C64 artist, S.I.T. will create a unique personalised \r\navatar of you! The ULTIMATE avatar for a true C64 fan! You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE BOOK PLUS YOUR OWN SPREAD: You get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory and also YOU get to own your own spread. YOU choose the game to be featured and even write a mini review to go with it! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE THALAMUS PLEDGE: You get a Original A4 Hawkeye poster signed by Boys 
Without Brains and Jeroen Tel. BNIB sealed 
disk copy on Nobby The Ardvark signed by artist Jonathan Smyth. A Creatures bug signed by Steve and John Rowlands and the FIRST 5 BACKERS get a BNIB copy of Quedex 
on cassette! You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

THE LAST NINJA PLEDGE: You will get a ONE OFF, beautifully framed Last Ninja print, signed by original artist; Steinar Lund. Frame size is 60cm x 80cm. You also get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory! As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.

YOU GET EVERYTHING PLUS AN ADVERT: You get the book in all it's full colour lithographic glory signed by Stoo Cambridge and also a set of all 5 'Loader' postcards. You will also get a signed copy of MICRO HEXAGON game. On top of that you will also get a full page advert next to the 'backers' page in the book. As an official backer of the campaign, you will get your name in the book and access to updates. Also included will be a PDF version of the book. You will also get an exclusive handwritten 'Loader' postcard right after the campaign finishes.
